title.rendered: Rescheduled Dates for Philadelphia Shows Announced

content.rendered:
Philadelphia Shows Rescheduled for Aug. 21, 2024 and Aug. 23, 2024 at Citizens Bank Park

The rescheduled dates for the postponed Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band shows at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia will be next season on Wednesday, Aug. 21, 2024 and Friday, Aug. 23, 2024.

All tickets from the postponed concerts will be valid for the new dates. Tickets for the Wednesday, Aug. 16, 2023 show will be valid for the Wednesday, Aug. 21, 2024 show and tickets for the Friday, Aug. 18, 2023 show will be valid for the Friday, Aug. 23, 2024 show.

Tickets for both rescheduled shows are on sale now at Phillies.com/Springsteen. Additional seats have been opened for both shows with great sightlines.

If you wish to request a refund for your existing tickets, information is available on Phillies.com/Springsteen. All tickets purchased through Phillies.com/Springsteen will have a 30-day window starting on Wednesday, Aug. 30, 2023 to request a refund. For tickets purchased through a secondary site, customers will need to contact their original point of purchase to review options.

All tickets will be good for the rescheduled dates as outlined above.
